meanings.definition: Of or relating to a prothonotary.
meanings.sent1: The prothonotarial robes worn by the judge were bright red.
meanings.sent2: The prothonotarial duties included keeping records and issuing writs.
meanings.sent3: The prothonotarial squirrel meticulously organized its acorn collection.
meanings.sent4: Her prothonotarial attention to detail was unmatched in the office.
meanings.sent5: The prothonotarial decorations in the courtroom added a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the office of a prothonotary.
meanings.sent1: The prothonotarial staff worked diligently to process legal documents.
meanings.sent2: The prothonotarial office was located on the second floor of the courthouse.
meanings.sent3: The prothonotarial printer seemed to have a mind of its own, constantly jamming.
meanings.sent4: His prothonotarial authority was respected by all who entered the office.
meanings.sent5: The prothonotarial filing system was a model of efficiency.

meanings.definition: In the style of a prothonotary.
meanings.sent1: The prothonotarial handwriting on the document was elegant and precise.
meanings.sent2: The prothonotarial seal on the letter gave it an official look.
meanings.sent3: The prothonotarial dance at the ball was graceful and dignified.
meanings.sent4: Her prothonotarial speech was filled with formal language and protocol.
meanings.sent5: The prothonotarial portrait captured the essence of authority and tradition.
